Stratasys uPrint

Uses and Constraints

Great for printing multiple parts at once and for parts which require more involved supports

Materials

~ABS Plus Plastic: Prints in one color

Dimensions

~Maximum Print Size: 20.3 x 15.2 x 15.2 cm

~Minimum layer height: 0.254mm, 0.01 in

Made by the uPrint

Thingiverse is an open source forum of 3D printing, laser cutting, and CNC designs. It is a great resource for inpiration. Download any design, edit it, and bring it to life! Below are a few fun examples of things you can make
